content:
| Segment | Starting Position | Ending Position | What Moved Them |
|---------|-------------------|-----------------|-----------------|
| Philadelphia suburban women | Lean R | Strong D | Abortion, candidate quality contrast |
| Pittsburgh union households | Soft D | Strong D | Working-class roots, Social Security |
| Scranton working-class | Persuadable | Strong D | Hometown connection, authenticity |
| Pennsylvania seniors | Mixed | Lean D | Medicare/Social Security, prescription drugs |
| College-educated professionals | Lean D | Strong D | Abortion, democracy concerns |
| Rural Pennsylvania | Strong R | Strong R | Not enough investment to test |
